title: Yasuo causing in game [Crash}
body:
3 out of 3 times when picking Yasuo  (project Yasuo skin for further detail) has crash the on entering summoner rift.
As the characters are loaded onto the fountain it freezes the game like solid, can't quit the game client by any means soft or hard options. 
I need to reboot laptop and reconnect and then no problems for rest of game, but this takes 10 mins. 
I have been playing with friends each of these times and they game is fine they say I remain connect until I reboot the laptop.
This has happened 3 out of 3 Yasuo games but with no other character.
To make matters worse it has trigger Leave Buster on my account due to these crashes so the only think I can do is stop picking Yasuo until the problem is fixed. I have contacted tech support but they don't know how long the fix will take.
Hopefully a new Patch will fix this has it has only happened recently and I have been playing Yasuo for a long time with no problems.

replies.body:
Solution here (Found it with the tech support) : 

Navigate to the following directory: C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
Delete both the game.cfg and input.ini files. Note that this will reset all of your settings back to default.

DON'T reactivate the HUD animation once you have done this, it looks like this was causing the bug, don't activate it until the fix comes and you should be fine
Same problem. Dozens of threads. No response from Riot.

> [{quoted}](name=crimsonregret99,realm=OCE,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=Uk95JXTV,comment-id=,timestamp=2014-12-27T00:06:15.234+0000)
>

> I need to reboot laptop and reconnect and then no problems for rest of game, but this takes 10 mins. 


Run in borderless windowed mode. Then you can alt-tab to desktop, open task manager, and end League process. 
Don't know a fix for the bug, tho.
Or you can just spam click League until Windows asks you to close.
